Gloss: elder brother of one’s husband (Nepali जेटाजु)
paternal side (father’s) younger brother (Nepali कान्छा बा)
maternal side (mother’s) younger sister (Nepali सा नी आमा)
younger brother’s wife (Nepali सा नी आमा)
reciprocal term used by fathers of married couple

Dura: ʈʰiʈī (Indo-Aryan), jʰanā, pāpārā, hālimerī, aie ~ aire (Nagila 2008)

Gloss: gruel or porridge (from millet or corn)
uncooked, usually soaked, whole rice grains offered in worship or religious ceremonies
preparation of water boiled with sugar, clarified butter and spices (Nepali कांढा)
pipe made from bamboo for blowing on fire
storage basket with legs, placed on floor
wide, flat basket for carrying vegetables
